image_generation_prompt.subject: Minimalist tech-organic logo for NaturaSkin AI
visual_elements: Stylized abstract human face profile facing right
One half of the face morphing into a green leaf structure
A pure water droplet visible near the cheek area
image_generation_prompt.technical_constraints: No text, centered composition, high contrast, 1:1 aspect ratio, 4k resolution

marketing_rationale: Combines technology (AI) with nature (Leaf) and hydration (Droplet) to visually communicate 'Natural Skin Restoration'.
